name: Panzer Duel
overview: Panzer duel was published along with 3 other games (Ghost Driver\Hell Driver, African Beads\Owerri and Chinamen) in Super Games Pack 1. A duel between two tanks shooting at each other over a hill. Get the trajectory and velocity right but don't forget to allow for the wind changes as it changes with every shot. A game for two players pitting their skills against each other to survive bombardment and demolish the opposing tank.
